info.name: CMDS - GraphQL API Collection
info.description: GraphQL API Collection generated from IntrospectionQuery

request.description: List Machines with optional filtering, skipping, and limiting
List Monitoring Devices with optional filtering, skipping, and limiting
Get Monitoring Profile Update Versions by IDs
Download device identity file by monitoring device ID

body.raw:
{
  "operationName": "updateSite",
  "variables": {
    "id": "1",
    "name": "example",
    "industryId": "example",
    "countryId": "example",
    "postalCode": "example",
    "region": "example",
    "city": "example",
    "street": "example",
    "latitude": 123.45,
    "longitude": 123.45,
    "additionalInfo": "example",
    "contactPersons": null
  },
  "query": "mutation updateSite($id: ID!, $name: String, $industryId: String, $countryId: String, $postalCode: String, $region: String, $city: String, $street: String, $latitude: Float, $longitude: Float, $additionalInfo: String, $contactPersons: [ContactPersonDetailsInput]) {\n  updateSite(id: $id, name: $name, industryId: $industryId, countryId: $countryId, postalCode: $postalCode, region: $region, city: $city, street: $street, latitude: $latitude, longitude: $longitude, additionalInfo: $additionalInfo, contactPersons: $contactPersons) {\n    id\n    name\n    industry {\n    id\n    name\n    __typename\n  }\n    country {\n    id\n    name\n    __typename\n  }\n    postalCode\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}

request.description: Create an Area in a Site
Assign Monitoring Profile Update Version to Machine
Create a new Monitoring Profile Update Version

body.raw:
{
  "operationName": "createMonitoringDevice",
  "variables": {
    "areaId": "1",
    "name": "example",
    "serialNumber": "example",
    "type": null,
    "ipAddress": "example",
    "ntpUrl": "example",
    "status": null,
    "useDhcp": true,
    "defaultGateway": "example",
    "netmask": "example",
    "dnsServer": "example",
    "machineIds": "1",
    "tagIds": "1",
    "productionDate": "example",
    "deviceVersion": "example",
    "commissioningDate": "example",
    "commissioningStatus": null,
    "updateStatus": null
  },
  "query": "mutation createMonitoringDevice($areaId: ID!, $name: String!, $serialNumber: String!, $type: MonitoringDeviceType!, $ipAddress: String!, $ntpUrl: String, $status: MonitoringDeviceStatus, $useDhcp: Boolean!, $defaultGateway: String!, $netmask: String!, $dnsServer: String!, $machineIds: [ID!], $tagIds: [ID!], $productionDate: String, $deviceVersion: String, $commissioningDate: String, $commissioningStatus: CommissioningStatusType, $updateStatus: MonitoringDeviceUpdateStatus) {
  createMonitoringDevice(areaId: $areaId, name: $name, serialNumber: $serialNumber, type: $type, ipAddress: $ipAddress, ntpUrl: $ntpUrl, status: $status, useDhcp: $useDhcp, defaultGateway: $defaultGateway, netmask: $netmask, dnsServer: $dnsServer, machineIds: $machineIds, tagIds: $tagIds, productionDate: $productionDate, deviceVersion: $deviceVersion, commissioningDate: $commissioningDate, commissioningStatus: $commissioningStatus, updateStatus: $updateStatus) {
    id
    name
    serialNumber
    site {
    id
    name
    industry {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
    country {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
    postalCode
    __typename
  }
    area {
    id
    name
    siteId
    monitoringDevices {
    id
    name
    serialNumber
    site
    area
    __typename
  }
    __typename
  }
    __typename
  }
}"
}

{
  "operationName": "updateMonitoringDevice",
  "variables": {
    "id": "1",
    "areaId": "1",
    "name": "example",
    "serialNumber": "example",
    "type": null,
    "ipAddress": "example",
    "ntpUrl": "example",
    "status": null,
    "useDhcp": true,
    "defaultGateway": "example",
    "netmask": "example",
    "dnsServer": "example",
    "machineIds": "1",
    "tagIds": "1",
    "productionDate": "example",
    "deviceVersion": "example",
    "commissioningDate": "example",
    "commissioningStatus": null,
    "updateStatus": null
  },
  "query": "mutation updateMonitoringDevice($id: ID!, $areaId: ID, $name: String, $serialNumber: String, $type: MonitoringDeviceType, $ipAddress: String, $ntpUrl: String, $status: MonitoringDeviceStatus, $useDhcp: Boolean, $defaultGateway: String, $netmask: String, $dnsServer: String, $machineIds: [ID], $tagIds: [ID], $productionDate: String, $deviceVersion: String, $commissioningDate: String, $commissioningStatus: CommissioningStatusType, $updateStatus: MonitoringDeviceUpdateStatus) {
  updateMonitoringDevice(id: $id, areaId: $areaId, name: $name, serialNumber: $serialNumber, type: $type, ipAddress: $ipAddress, ntpUrl: $ntpUrl, status: $status, useDhcp: $useDhcp, defaultGateway: $defaultGateway, netmask: $netmask, dnsServer: $dnsServer, machineIds: $machineIds, tagIds: $tagIds, productionDate: $productionDate, deviceVersion: $deviceVersion, commissioningDate: $commissioningDate, commissioningStatus: $commissioningStatus, updateStatus: $updateStatus) {
    id
    name
    serialNumber
    site {
    id
    name
    industry {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
    country {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
    postalCode
    __typename
  }
    area {
    id
    name
    siteId
    monitoringDevices {
    id
    name
    serialNumber
    site
    area
    __typename
  }
    __typename
  }
    __typename
  }
}"
}

exec: // Reset cleanup array at the beginning of tests

body.raw:
{
  "operationName": "createSite",
  "variables": {
    "name": "Test Site {{$timestamp}}",
    "industryId": "{{test_industry_id}}",
    "countryId": "{{test_country_id}}",
    "postalCode": "12-345",
    "region": "Test Region",
    "city": "Test City",
    "street": "Test Street 123",
    "latitude": 52.237049,
    "longitude": 21.017532,
    "additionalInfo": "Auto-generated test site"
  },
  "query": "mutation createSite($name: String!, $industryId: String!, $countryId: String!, $postalCode: String!, $region: String!, $city: String!, $street: String!, $latitude: Float, $longitude: Float, $additionalInfo: String, $contactPersons: [ContactPersonDetailsInput]) { createSite(name: $name, industryId: $industryId, countryId: $countryId, postalCode: $postalCode, region: $region, city: $city, street: $street, latitude: $latitude, longitude: $longitude, additionalInfo: $additionalInfo, contactPersons: $contactPersons) { id name industry { id name __typename } country { id name __typename } postalCode __typename } }"
}
